pr_title: Handle possible race condition at in-memory search

timeline.message: Handle possible race condition at in-memory search

timeline.bodyText: Out of curiosity - what does this do?
timeline.author: EricWittmann

replies.bodyText: I mean obviously it marks the method as possibly returning null, but what does the IDE do with that info?
replies.author: EricWittmann

replies.bodyText: Auto-added by the IDE since I'm explicitly returning null, nothing functionally, just marker afaik.
replies.author: carlesarnal

replies.bodyText: For Idea, this is what is doing.
replies.author: carlesarnal
